title: nilayam onru
sahitya:
nilayam onrenakk-aruLvAi yOga niSTaiyil UnriyE ninnaruT-paNi sheyya


anupallavi

  malai nadi vaLam sheyu malar kani shOlaiyil mAn pashu puLLinam vAzh pashum kOyilil


caraNam 1    pala jAti matangaLin kalagamillAmalE parishuddha sanmArga bhaktaruDanE kUDi
kalaigaLum tozhilgaLum phalan pera vaLarttoru kavalaiyuminri nAn kaDavuL arattai kAkka
    caraNam 2    varumai maDamai accam vanjam porAmaiyinri vAimaiyumtUimaiyum tAi mana nEyamum
nirai tava ozhukkamum irai aruT-jyOtiyum nilaviDum pUraNa nirmalarkkAghiya
    caraNam 3    bhU uyirt-toghudiyE punita meik-kaDavuLAi pNNiyat-toNDugaL pUjanaiyAgavE
dEva jIvanam peTra divya dhIragaL jagattinil sattiya yugattinai vaLarttiDum
